name: Horticulture Haven
description:
A Mental Health Game created during the Health Game Jam 2021 in Germany

The game combines Idle-Clicker with sandbox game elements and shows the process of getting out of depression. 

Xavier Burrull Allan - Programming

Fabius Quien - Programming

Steffi Schröder - 2D Art

Jesse Ressler - 2D Art

Anne-Sophie Bode - 2D Art 

Elfi Kühndorf - Game Design

Music:  https://www.bensound.com

Sound: https://freesound.org/
